Account Officer Job at the Changeroom




        
    

        
        Changeroom was established in 2012 with a vision to produce quality human resource solutions. We plan to achieve this by partnering with our clients to provide highly specialized consulting services in the areas of human resources development and business management services. Our partnership approach affords us the opportunity of working with you to find the most efficient and appropriate solutions to meet your short, medium and long-term goals. In partnering with your organization, we make it our business to understand yoaur business, embrace its values, aims and objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Responsibilitie


	Accurately post transactions, maintain ledgers, and keep a detailed record of all receipts and payments.
	Process invoices, manage payments, and follow up on overdue payments from clients.
	Reconcile bank statements, credit cards, and other financial accounts to ensure accuracy.
	Assist in preparing and analyzing financial statements, reports, and budgets.
	Verify the accuracy of invoices and reconcile accounts with the general ledger.
	Support with tasks like preparing tax returns, VAT returns, and National Insurance contributions.
	Maintain records of company costs, such as labor and materials.
	Handle general account and financial queries from both internal and external parties.
	Manage and process company payroll.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 5 years of experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.changeroom@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Sales & Marketing Executive Job at Interrand Homes & Properties Limited




        
    

        
        Interrand Homes & Properties Limited (subsidiary of Interrand Group) is a reputable Construction and Real Estate Development company with offices in Abuja, Lagos and Ibadan.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales & Marketing Executive

Job Locations: Gudu, Lifecamp, Karu, Lugbe, Kuje - Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type:

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are a growing real estate company looking for energetic and results-driven individuals to join our sales and marketing team. If you enjoy connecting with people, presenting properties, and closing deals, this could be your next opportunity.


Key Responsibilities


	Generate leads and identify potential clients
	Promote and market properties effectively
	Conduct property viewings and follow up with clients
	Maintain client relationships and ensure excellent customer service
	Achieve and exceed sales targets
	Support the marketing team with campaigns and promotions


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an ND/HND or equivalent qualification
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Results-oriented and persuasive
	Basic computer literacy
	Prior experience in real estate sales or marketing is a plus


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: HR@interrandgroup.com using "Sales & Marketing Executive Application (Location)" as the subject of the email.

Note: Only candidates residing around Lugbe, Lifecamp, Karu, Gudu and Kuje will be considered.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Brand Manager",
  "description": "Nigeria Distilleries Limited -&nbsp;We are the largest Manufacturer of Spirits and Wines in Nigeria; NDL was incorporated in 1961 with the mission to offer the best brands to a market thirsty for excellent quality wines and spirits. A wholly Nigerian-owned company, NDL began production in 1979 with the blending and bottling of international brands like Dubonnet, Ambassadeur, Suze, Campari, Cointreau, Dorville Brandy, Pimms, and Martini. Currently we produce premium drinks like the well-known Seaman&rsquo;s Schnapps prayer drink, Lord&rsquo;s Dry Gin, Calypso, Bacchus Wine, etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Brand Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Brand Manager has the responsibility for ensuring the achievement of the company&rsquo;s market share, brand equity, gross margin, brand awareness and penetration.


Responsibilities


	Ensure the achievement of agreed-upon sales volumes and gross margins for the product group.
	Ensure achievement of planned market share, profitability, awareness, and penetration to sustain market leadership.
	Ensure efficient deployment of agreed brands spend to achieve the agreed level of profitability and brand equity.
	Manage and motivate his team to increase their confidence level of vibrancy necessary to drive innovation.
	Ensure the achievement of the designated brand image and equity in the marketplace to sustain competitive superiority.
	Ensure the availability of agreed-upon products and stock-keeping units (SKUs) to avoid stockouts and minimise the falsification of any pack sizes.


Requirements


	First degree.
	An MBA in Marketing will be an added advantage.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience, out of which a minimum of 3 years should be in Brand Management experience, and 2 must have been in Sales with responsibility for Channel Management.


The person must:


	Be data-driven, proficient with Microsoft Office suites and able to develop insights for data.
	Be comfortable with travelling to different parts of the country.
	Be organised to keep track of brand details.


Salary
N350,000 - N600,000 / month.",
